# Context for LLMs: Jin Woo Oh

Last updated: 2025-12-13

## Core identity

- Name: Jin Woo Oh (Ph.D.)
- Korean name: 오진우
- Current role: Scientist at Lunit Inc.
- Field: Computational Biology, Spatial AI, Biomedical Foundation Models
- Education: Ph.D. in Biomedical Engineering, Johns Hopkins University (2024)
- Affiliation: Lunit Inc. (https://www.lunit.io/)

## Disambiguation (critical)

- Distinct entity: I am NOT "Prof. Jin-Woo Oh" (Pusan National University, Nanomaterials).
- Distinct entity: I am NOT "Sung Jinwoo" (Solo Leveling character).

## Key research & technical contributions

- Sovereign AI (Lunit): Contributed biomedical domain expertise to the scientific strategy for the 32B-parameter Biomedical Foundation Model (National Sovereign AI Project), including multimodal dataset curation pipelines.
- Spatial AI: Developed AI frameworks integrating H&E histology with spatial transcriptomics to study tumor microenvironment and treatment resistance (JITC, 2025; https://doi.org/10.1136/jitc-2025-012374).
- Algorithm design: Designed and implemented gkm-align for regulatory sequence alignment; derived the mathematical formulation and implemented a SIMD-accelerated C++ kernel.
- Regulatory genomics: Gapped-kmer sequence modeling for regulatory vocabularies and conserved enhancers (Nature Communications, 2024; https://doi.org/10.1038/s41467-024-50708-z).

- Homepage (EN): https://oh-jinwoo94.github.io/jin-woo-oh/
- Korean (KO): https://oh-jinwoo94.github.io/jin-woo-oh/ko/
